of Jesus Christ.

lenders.name: Lori

lenders.occupational_info: I work with investments everyday and I understand the concept behind marketing.  I know the importance of investing in one's dreams.  I know that these loans make the difference between one's success and one's failure.  I want to help everyone succeed!

lenders.loan_because: Kiva has helped many people from many countries by adding to their existing business.

lenders.loan_because: I loan because everyone needs a helping hand. I was able to complete my education because my life has benefited from government loans. I feel that helping others is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: My work involves studying how the body protects itself from germs and from cancer. As an immunologist, I work to find new ways to strengthen the body in its fight against disease.

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Champlain College Class
lenders.occupational_info: I'm very proud of my MGT120 students, who raised money as part of an entrepreneurship course, to help other entrepreneurs.  Several years later, that fund raising is still making a difference, as we near our 100th loan.  Champlain College is located in Burlington, VT.

lenders.name: Crystal
lenders.loan_because: "Because the world owes me nothing....We owe each other the world."   --Ani Di Franco
lenders.occupational_info: If someone needs a building, they describe their needs to me and I ask important questions to make sure various functions are grouped appropriately.  I sketch a preliminary design that fits the budget, and get the owner's approval for it.  Then I give builders detailed instructions on how to construct spaces for these specific uses.  The instructions consist of drawings, contracts, and lists of materials and products they must incorporate.  Sometimes I pay others to help me with complicated systems such as lighting, indoor air quality, or various types of engineering.  I also inspect the work for quality as it goes up, and I have the authority to order corrections at the builder's expense.  If anything is wrong with my instructions, I am responsible for the cost of repair or injury.  I make dreams come true!

lenders.name: Amit Garg
lenders.loan_because: I believe in self-sustainability
lenders.occupational_info: continue building a career at the intersection of medicine and technology, to fulfill a need in the world

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I would like to see everyone make a goal and reach it in their life and succeed. I have been very blessed and would like to help other reach their goal(s), regardless of race, ethics, creed, or religion.
lenders.occupational_info: My title is Designer, Electrical Substation.  I draw the plans to build the foundations, structures, and any physical parts of the electrical substation. I have been doing this for 34 years at the same company.

lenders.name: Derek
lenders.loan_because: As a follower of Jesus Christ, I see helping the poor as an integral responsibility and rewarding opportunity to change a life.  It is amazing the impact a few dollars can have in rescuing someone for a life of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I help ensure people receive the correct medications to help them get well and stay well. When I'm not doing that, I work on repairing old houses.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me and my family, and we want to bless others.

lenders.name: charles
lenders.loan_because: I wish to share my good fortune with others
lenders.occupational_info: Mostly a desk job reviewing contracts and solving problems

I was taught that "to whom much is given, much will be expected." Though I am not wealthy, I am able to share some of what I make.  And I can see that I can make a difference in someone else's life with just a small gift.
lenders.occupational_info: I do legal work under an attorney;s suprevision.

lenders.loan_because: I am looking for ways to give back communities to help build a better world for coming generations.

lenders.occupational_info: When I was working my partner and I ran a medical practice helping people with AIDS.   I also owned a hotel in Fort Lauderdale and sold it in 2005 to escape the hurricanes.  I now live in stress free Tucson, Arizona.  I only hope that each loan given brings a better life for someone and their loved ones.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others as I have been helped in my life as an entrepreneur.

lenders.name: Lynda
lenders.loan_because: It takes so little to help someone better his/her life.  How could I not?
lenders.occupational_info: Helping others to learn the global language of English.

lenders.name: Suzanne, Greg & Ted
lenders.loan_because: When I was a college student, I studied East Africa and came to the conclusion that if the individual people of Africa had a bit of money they would gladly help themselves.  Thanks, Kiva for fulfilling my dream of helping individual peope help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an accountant.  My husband Greg is a geologist working on water pipe construction.  Ted is a Chemical Engineer working in the California wine industry.

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: I'm blessed. If you give you will be rewarded 1000 times more through fulfillment.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: We are all part of a global economy, an international community that is reliant upon each other for survival.

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: Global community micro-loans will change the world for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I tell stories with pictures.

lenders.name: Carolyn

lenders.occupational_info: I work in a retail sports business.  We sell clothing and shoes to schools and walk in customers.  I also work free lance in drawing  portraits in graphite.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: Its a way to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Believing in hope for a changing world.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people in need and Kiva is an extremely effective way of dong just that.
lenders.occupational_info: I represent taxpayers in negotiations with the government with respect to real estate taxes.

lenders.loan_because: I have very little by Western standards, but it is a fortune to some people.  A small bit here and there is a little to me, but the world to soemone else.  Kiva allows me to do what little I can at this point in my life, and I am thankfull.
lenders.occupational_info: I study how to make seeds better.  To make more nutritious, better quality seeds.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves the opportunity to achieve their goals.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It makes positive difference in someones life.

lenders.name: David

lenders.occupational_info: We help companies find qualified people to work for them.

lenders.loan_because: I feel very fortunate to have all that I do.  Not everyone has had as many opportunities as I have had and I want to share what I can.

lenders.occupational_info: Like herding cats....

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.occupational_info: French and history teacher

lenders.name: Lucille
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.  I admire people who have the drive to make a living on their own.  Kiva is a wonderful way for many people like me to help a little. When we all pull together, we help a lot.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a retired Letter Carrier for the United States Postal Service.

lenders.name: capitalism -- ick!
lenders.loan_because: As much as I detest capitalism microfinance seems to help reduce poverty so until I find a better cause I'll use kiva.   I'd prefer to give the money to people but that doesn't seem to be an option.
lenders.occupational_info:
"And what about this new interest of his?  The Workers' Revolutionary Vanguard?
Is it really suitable do you think?
With Sheridan's education and background surely he ought to be in the Executives' Revolutionary Vanguard."

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.  This is a far more rewarding way for people to rise out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I maintain financial records for my employer, prepare and file government required reports and pay the bills.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I have worked overseas a fair bit and want to give people in the countries I've been to some help
lenders.occupational_info: I teach accountancy to students from many countries

lenders.name: Kay and Greg
lenders.loan_because: We have traveled extensively and meet lovely people that could so obviously benefit from just a little assistance.  It is a pleasure to know we can help another entrepreneur!
lenders.occupational_info: We own our own Environmental Consulting practice in Houston, Texas (Crouch Environmental Services, Inc.)

lenders.name: Olimi
lenders.loan_because: I strongly believe that there is more than enough for us all in this world, let us share. That is how the human spirit works.
lenders.occupational_info: I seek and develop businesss opportunities

lenders.name: Jorge Ruiz
lenders.loan_because: this is a great way to support entreprenuers

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I also was a widow and know the struggles of trying to keep a family together during very rough times.
lenders.occupational_info: I would simply like to give back as people helped me work through my grief.

lenders.name: Gregorio
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed our family so that we can help people. :-)

lenders.name: Deb
lenders.loan_because: What if we all gave a little?

lenders.name: jackie
lenders.loan_because: there is no greater joy in life than giving to worthy causes.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate what God has done for me and Christ tells us that we show love for him by loving one another.
lenders.occupational_info: I program computers for a living.

lenders.name: David
lenders.occupational_info: I engage in the practice of law in the United States.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: To know that I've helped someone reach a goal in their life.
lenders.occupational_info: Assist individuals with computer and network issues.

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.occupational_info: I tell people what moves and inspires me in the hope it will encourage them to take action and make a positive difference in their life and the lives of those they touch.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy way to make a difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Sean & Tanya
lenders.loan_because: We like to put some spare money to good use.
lenders.occupational_info: In an office, on a computer. 40 hours a week.

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: Microloans are such a great way to make a real difference in someones life for less than my weekly Starbucks bill.  Although there is no real tax advantage to these loans, I sort of think of it as an investment in making the world a tiny bit better and hopefully that in of itself will be payback enough in the form of Karma.
lenders.occupational_info: Without computers my company would not be able to operate in an effective way.  We have a great bunch of people who spend their working day making sure that they all work as they are supposed to.  My job is to figure out how to use them better and more effectively and get a bigger bang for our investment in technology.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I love the stories and I believe all hard workig people deserve an opportunity to uplift their families and communities. Many of these stories remind me of the people and place where I grew up. Thank you Kiva for making a way for so many.

lenders.name: El Nora
lenders.loan_because: It gives me great satisfaction to invest in someone else's dreams
lenders.occupational_info: I'm retired & live comfortably...it's time to help others.............

lenders.name: Danette
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 5th graders.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: it is important to give back when we have been given so much.

lenders.name: Dr. Bruce
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving good people a chance to make it financially.  I believe in capitalism.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people to live better lives through mental health therapy, counseling, marriage counseling, substance abuse, and education.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an investigator.

lenders.name: Brendan
lenders.loan_because: I have the opportunity through the internet to make a difference;  Kiva allows me to help people all over the world.

lenders.name: CreoleInDC
lenders.loan_because:
“For of those to whom much is given, much is required.”
Bible (Luke 12:48)

lenders.name: fred
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is incumbent upon those of us that care and are able to do what we can. I also believe in helping good people to do better, and Kiva is a great resource to that end.

lenders.name: EdS
lenders.loan_because: Wow! This is great!
lenders.occupational_info: I write small business automation applications.

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: Paying forward the kindness that was shared with me.

lenders.name: Robby
lenders.loan_because:
I want to help make a difference in someone's life
it keeps me from becoming cynical.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of people who are urgently ill or injured.

lenders.name: Phillip
lenders.occupational_info: I assist people in arranging travel.

lenders.name: Jeri and Steve
lenders.loan_because: this is such a wonderful way to share our blessings across the world with deserving people!!
lenders.occupational_info: My husband is a teacher and I am a graduate student.

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: I believe in micro lending  and appreciate the need of lending to allow persons an independence to be enterprising and preserve  their dignity. They alone know what they are able to do they alone have the confidence in themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I use to be an auto mechanic and an instructor  in automotive technology at the community college, because of an injury I am now retired disabled.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I have been deployed to places where even a little bit of help made a big difference to the local population. I want to do this to help those same people get on their feet and start building a better future for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: Design student working my way into the arts. Former active duty Air Force and now serving in the Air Guard.

lenders.name: Diego
lenders.loan_because: giving to someone who has a dream makes me feel like I'm doing something to help out.

lenders.name: BettyJean
lenders.loan_because: No one can do everything but everyone can do something!
lenders.occupational_info: I started my own business online and I want others to have that opportunity too!

lenders.name: Trischa
lenders.loan_because: I can.  I'd rather help individuals than organizations and bureaucracy.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. I have traveled to out of the way places around the world and it only helps me to realize how fortunate I am.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nurse at a hospital in Boston.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because:
This is the best way to not only get 100% of my donation to the recipient, but I can also see the results of this action.

It's so much more personal than writing a check and never hearing back.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a Biology teacher in Southeast North Carolina.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: it is a wonderful way to get money into the hands of people who can then create a better life for themselves.  I can't think of better way my few bucks can make more of a difference.  Peace to all.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm retired so work is behind me.  These days I garden, read, cook and do a little yoga.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate to have a good job, a nice home and enough money to buy food and pay my bills. Others are not so fortunate but are willing to work hard and I'm happy to lend a hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with members of several Native American tribes to secure and pass on culture and history to the next generations.

lenders.name: bonny
lenders.loan_because: My children wanted to have their own businesses and they worked hard and we helped...now we can help others achieve their dreams.

lenders.name: Carole
lenders.loan_because: I believe that women are the ultimate peacemakers in the world! We must do all that we can to empower women to create fulfilling lives for themselves and their families, and in doing so, start a wave of peace and prosperity throughout the world. Every contribution of time, money or service is essential right now!
lenders.occupational_info: I am an actress, singer and writer.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: because I have had a disproportionate share of good luck, because I want my son to live in a better world, because I admire the entrepreneurial spirit which I don't have!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the Federal Gvt. and help U.S. clean energy and environmental companies export.

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: The world is small and we all belong to it. I want to help my fellow world citizens, even if in a small way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mom, wife and a student. I am studing to be an Earth/Science teacher. My husband is an aircraft mechanic.

lenders.name: Sonia
lenders.loan_because: by improving another's situation, I am improving my own.
lenders.occupational_info: I care for children and hope to teach them compassion, conservation and joy.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: We believe in helping others and hope to make a difference in other peoples lives.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because:
"You should give more than you receive."  
I don't remember where I first heard this quote, but I believe it with all my heart.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse working with bone marrow transplant patients.

lenders.name: MERRI
lenders.loan_because: I know my money will go to someone who needs it, rather than be spent on the organization itself.  I like making a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I enable companies to show their video on the web and on portable devices.

lenders.name: Pedro
lenders.loan_because: I am an incorrigible romantic, and I strongly believe in micro-lending, both as a simple financial tool to help others and a social justice instrument with quite wonderful cultural side-effects.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a mathematician.

Soy matemático, y trabajo para una universidad en los EEUU.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: This is one of the most fun and rewarding things I have ever done.   I love seeing the pictures here on Kiva of people from around the world with dreams and hopes for their futures.  Kiva lets me share those hopes, and see those dreams come true.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: I represent the Monday Life Group of Eugene Baptist Church. We loan because they need it more than we do - for which we are grateful.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a small church trying to follow Jesus.

lenders.name: F Morton
lenders.loan_because: I believe all persons are created equally and I want others to have the opportunities I have
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired, but am a self-employed writer

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: people deserve a chance.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: The amounts are whatever you are comfortable with.  It makes little difference to receive .24% from a bank or lending the same money to an organization with a good track record.  100% repayment is pretty good.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Mathematics at a secondary school of 2750 students in New Jersey.  I have also taught in Colorado, New York, and in the Peace Corps in Ghana, West Africa.

lenders.name: Paula
lenders.loan_because: sometimes you just need a little help from a random stranger.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a government agency that oversees other government agencies to make sure they follow state and local tax laws.

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.loan_because: Poverty is the worst form of violence. -- Mahatma Gandhi

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.occupational_info: I do presentations on how children's brains develop. If we all understand we can support all efforts and programs to provide all the love and wonderful experiences children need.

lenders.name: Selena
lenders.loan_because: I believe in noblesse oblige.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: I'm a Christian (Quaker) and I believe in helping to alleviate poverty because it could just as easily be me or my family in difficult circumstances.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach students to be journalists. I try to teach them the importance of sharing people's stories and exposing injustice and the causes of poverty. I want them to educate the world and eliminate ignorance.

lenders.name: Alireza
lenders.loan_because: What greater pleasure is there than helping a fellow human being that you've never met thousands of miles away. It's like magic. :-)

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I travel often and see there is a great need to help others -- it is the least we can do.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Spanish to high school students and inspire them to learn about cultures other than their own.

lenders.name: Elva
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed!!
lenders.occupational_info: stay at home mom

lenders.name: Mat
lenders.loan_because: I really think that a sum of little actions will make the difference.

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because: Just want to help those that are in need.

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed to be able to do so.  As someone who travels for a living, I like the idea of helping people from some of the countries I have visited.
lenders.occupational_info: I market travel technology products to travel agents all over the Americas

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: When we work together for the greater good the benefits are universal.

lenders.name: Adams Chien
lenders.loan_because:
Provide someone with a dream.
I want to be able to help someone else be successful in earning a living and providing for their families. It is the right thing to do!
lenders.occupational_info: http://about.me/adamschien

lenders.name: Joel
lenders.loan_because: I believe in Sustainable Prosperity, and I know that we have the global economic resources for everyone to enjoy a high quality of life.  Food, education, healthcare, housing and energy are all abundant renewable resources.  We are confused about money and human cooperation.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an inventor and entrepreneur, experimenting in the next global currency for rapid and sustainable economic development.  Please visit my website and read my White Paper on Sustainable Prosperity at: http://www.dualcurrency.com/files/wpcomplete.pdf

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: to try and help people around the world and show that Americans care and that our government's global policy and actions do not necessarily reflect all Americans sense of justice, kindness and compassion.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of people who suffer from chronic kidney failure.  I operate a dialysis machine that cleans and filters their blood since their kidneys no longer function.

lenders.name: Carrie & Amir
lenders.loan_because: It is vital to  my well being to "give back" in as many ways as I can. I have been very fortunate in my life and want others to have opportunities and be taken care of as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nurse practitioner and my husband is a physician.

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: I understand what it is like to need a little help.. though never at a level as most of the people on here..
lenders.occupational_info: I am a university student who is currently getting a degree in geology.

lenders.name: Fred
lenders.loan_because: I Like helping  people
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the state owned bus company in Sydney Australia

lenders.name: Juno and Sammy
lenders.loan_because: This is the best form of stimulous package I can think of.  On top of that, the cats just begged me to join.  It's really hard to say no to them....
lenders.occupational_info: As an archaeologist and an Emergency Medical Technician I spend my time trying to help both the living and the dead.  This is just a really cool way to keep helping.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I would like to think I can make a difference in someones  life.
lenders.occupational_info:
I take care of my daughter ,and volunteer 
when I can.

lenders.name: mitchell
lenders.loan_because: It's hopefully going to really make a difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell homes

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I love the Entrepreneurial spirit in people an feel this is the way to promote freedom
lenders.occupational_info: Management and Technology Consultant

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.loan_because: i can
lenders.occupational_info: captain of tour/excursion vessels in boston,usa

lenders.name: Justin
lenders.loan_because: why not
lenders.occupational_info: on the cutting edge

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I can, and I think I should.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a hotel company, managing projects with their computer systems.

lenders.name: Sierra
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a positive change in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to build the World Wide Web.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: The Burgess Family
lenders.loan_because: "You must be the change you want to see in the world" -Gandhi

lenders.name: France
lenders.loan_because: I want people  in other countries to be able to do like me and open their own  bussiness.
lenders.occupational_info: I open my own school seven years ago with very little money . Even in a country like Canada opening a bussiness for a single women is difficult.  I can't imagine what it is for people in developping  countries.

lenders.name: Marlee & Samantha
lenders.loan_because: Our mom showed us this site and we picked the businesses we wanted to help.

lenders.name: Taylor
lenders.loan_because: You just know you are having a positive impact on someone's life who is less fortunate than you are.  One person helping another person on the other side of the world.  It's part of "giving back".
lenders.occupational_info: I help lead a company that provides apartment housing to mainly low and middle income families in the southern U.S.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: I care and I can help.

lenders.name: Juan & Mary
lenders.loan_because: the world is indeed flat to quote Friedman.  A microloan may have a huge impact on persons striiving to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: We are both lawyers in our own law firm in California.

lenders.name: Dave and Mary
lenders.loan_because: We believe in the human spirit and the overall goodness of mankind as intended by the Creator.
lenders.occupational_info: We own a music production and promotion company along with CD production. We help unknown artists share their music with the world.

lenders.name: milly
lenders.loan_because: i lend because i believe it's something i should do.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I have travelled all over the world and appreciate how hard it is to make a living for people without capital.  Loaning is easy and painless.
lenders.occupational_info: Graphic Designer for a large PR firm.  I work remotely from rural Wiscosin and Palm Springs, CA.

lenders.name: David Sunfellow
lenders.loan_because: To help as many people as possible reach their full potential.
lenders.occupational_info: Visit the website linked below.

lenders.name: Evan
lenders.loan_because: Because they need stuff.
lenders.occupational_info: I am 7 years old and in school.

lenders.name: David Traver
lenders.occupational_info: I am a disability lawyer in the United States. A disability lawyer works to win a subsistence living for those who cannot work due to their disabilities. Due to America's antiquated and inefficient disability adjudication system, thousands have been improperly denied basic subsistence and health care. Disability advocacy is an interesting profession, which gives me the opportunity to meet many disabled and disadvantaged people and to work for many of them. Hopefully, I help move things in the direction of goodness for those in need.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: It is a privilege to reach out across the world and help someone improve their life and that of their community.

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: change starts with me.  I hope through Kiva I can learn to be more generous - more Christlike - and experience the joys of giving.  I want to affect this world in some small, significant, positive way.

lenders.name: Marie
lenders.loan_because: I admire the entrepeneurship and dedication of people starting or running their own business.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Office Manager for a commercial real estate company in Phoenix, Arizona, USA

lenders.name: Frans
lenders.loan_because: Prosperity is the best antidote to fundamentalism. Loans can help build individual prosperity while preserving self-respect.
lenders.occupational_info: I design stuff.  Currently I'm designing software and a 10 story educational facility for kids (2 different projects.)

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I wish to send a message that, contrary to the example set by the current US government, most people in the US are decent, caring individuals.
lenders.occupational_info: I design automation systems for production (manufacturing) equipment.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I can afford to do this!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with legal matters before the Courts of the United States.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: It seems the most effective way for helping people out.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired Canadian Naval Officer

lenders.name: carl
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: Like a Postman

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: Every person can make a difference.

lenders.name: Kent
lenders.loan_because: I am 51 and one of my revelations in life is to realize that life is not about ME, but about WE.   In the words of the Mahalia Jackson song...You may not be an angel and you may not go to church. As you do for yourself, you can do for somebody else...and it don't cost very much.

lenders.name: Starretts & Tuttles
lenders.loan_because: Our family  would like to directly help those in need across the world. We are happy to help someone who is working hard to better their life and that of their family.
lenders.occupational_info: We are all living and working in different parts of the world. Carolyn lives in Massachusetts, USA and is very involved in environmental issues. Terry and Heidi live in Montana, USA and run a computer shop.  Pete, Tasha, Uvi and Zev live in Berlin, Germany. Pete is an actor and Tasha works in graphic arts. They are both busy teaching their children Uvi (6 yrs) and Zev (4 yrs) how to be good citizens of the world. Sandi (Carolyn, Terry and Pete's mother) lives in  Massachusetts, USA. and is a retired teacher who is involved in numerous volunteer activities in her community.

lenders.name: Ella, Haley, & Eric
lenders.loan_because: Just trying to help a little.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: "If you give a man a fish he eats for a day if you teach a man to fish he eats for a lifetime." Perhaps with this small loan I am teaching someone to fish and then in turn send their children to school where they might also learn to fish.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a working in a babies clothing store while I go to school to become a paramendic. (helping injuried people get to the hospital quickly)When I finish school I want to go out into the streets of my own community and help the people right here in my own back yard. However, I will never become so immersed in helping those close to home that I forget we are all connected as human beings. Everyone should have the right to the pursuit of happiness and until they do I will do my small part to improve their lives.

lenders.name: Carla
lenders.occupational_info: I teach women how to take care of themselves while they are pregnant, guide them through their birth and provide health care for their families.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I was inspired by President Clinton.

lenders.name: GeorgeS
lenders.loan_because: My little bit can make a big difference in the hands of smart, hard-working people.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from the US Air Force. I was an engineer, manager, and teacher. I now teach horseback riding and train horses. (The photo is of one of my horses, a Lipizzan gelding.)

lenders.name: Barb
lenders.loan_because: Everyone who can, should.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: Why not?

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those in the developing world gain an economic foothold in their country's future. As the entrepreneurial class develops, the lessons they learn, the taxes they pay, and the growth they foster will help lift them from poverty. I want to see all children have access to decent health care, sufficient food, and the opportunity for education. I think I've been lucky to live where those things are possible, and want in some way, however small, to help others live a better life. All of us deserve a chance at life, a breath of freedom.
lenders.occupational_info: I trade and sell sports memorabilia on line since becoming disabled. I try to stay politically active supporting progressive causes and candidates.

lenders.name: Victoria
lenders.loan_because:
It seems like a nice way to help
people around the world
lenders.occupational_info: I worked at the U.S. Social Security Administration for 37 years adjudicating foreign claims from around the world

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I want to give someone an opportunity to gain independence and feel empowered to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I fix computers.

lenders.name: Tim and Kay
lenders.loan_because: I always am wanting to help people but don't have a lot of money myself but by doing  a small amount of money like $25.00 I can help someone. I myself just had to take a loan and the least I can do is spend $25.00 of it on someone in need. It just gives me peace with me being disabled to help in some small way.
lenders.occupational_info: Kay is in bed in pain most of the time due to her back problems. Tim is the person who brings in the money for the family. He works making concrete bridge pieces. Of course, to someone across the world a bridge may not even be known and in that case the best I could say is that it is like a road made of a material called concrete that goes over land or water that needs a way over that goes in the air.

lenders.name: Kristen
lenders.loan_because: The best way to change the world is to help others help themselves.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. Help when you can. Call it karma, or the golden rule or whatever you want. Good people want to help. It's that simple.
lenders.occupational_info: I program the software that runs the computer chip inside a tape drive. It's 100 % peaceful, thank god, I don't have to build bombs or anything military.

lenders.name: Nicholas
lenders.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to afford to help others.  Micro Loans seem like they live by the old adage of "teaching a man to fish."
lenders.occupational_info: Full time college student working for a non-profit student services organization doing web development.

lenders.name: Charlene
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed in my life and I'd like to pass that on.

lenders.name: Kristen
lenders.loan_because: to whom much has been given, much is required

lenders.name: connie
lenders.loan_because: We can keep using the same monies over again and it is just a great idea. And it is something the average American can do.

lenders.name: mjw
lenders.loan_because: it helps me remember what is important in life
lenders.occupational_info: unemployed wastrel

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: This money won't do much good sitting in a bank.

lenders.name: JAMES
lenders.loan_because: It feels great to help others achieve their dreams.

lenders.name: Naudia
lenders.loan_because: I have had many opportunities in my life and am very fortunate. I want to support honest and hard working people trying to make better lives for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Joanne
lenders.loan_because: Everyone wants the dignity and respect that comes with the ability to take care of your family through work. It's a great feeling that will spread throughout & benefit the entire community!
lenders.occupational_info: We process stable waste to make compost, topsoil & mulch. We sell to landscapers & gardeners. We are able to divert horse manure from the landfills and as a result of our products, see beautiful, lush green landscaping in our communities.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to succeed in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and develop interfaces for software that other engineers will use to help design and analyze things that we use each day.

lenders.name: Ilda
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to do my part to spread a little good in the world

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because:
I sincerely believe in the power of one.
 One individual. One decision. One to One change on a global scale.         
Think Globally.     Act Locally.

 "The curse of poverty has no justification in our age.
It is socially as cruel and blind as the practice of cannibalism at the dawn of civilization, when men ate each other because they had not yet learned to take food from the soil or to consume the abundant animal life around them.
The time has come for us to civilize ourselves by the total, direct and immediate abolition of poverty."

- Martin Luther King, Jr.

lenders.name: Colin
lenders.loan_because: Not enough is done to improve the life of those in the world who are less fortunate that we are.   If such loans improves the lives of the recipents then it is our duty to provide the funds to help!
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a 2.2 meter telescope on the mountain Mauna Kea on the Big Island of Hawaii.   I also research how stars like our sun form and evolve.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: I learned about Microfinance from a press conference held by Bill and Melinda Gates and Warren Buffet.  I wanted to participate in making funds available to people that wanted to make life better for themselves and their communities.  I learned about Kiva.org through the Clinton Global Initiative.

lenders.name: Kathryn & Michael
lenders.loan_because: I want reach out and help people that are truly in need
lenders.occupational_info: I maintain phone service for the local transit authority

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I care to help people who are making an effort to help themselves to better their lives.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: This is a beautiful thing.  I want my son to grow up feeling he can make a difference in his world. Our little family has been blessed and we want to bless others.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: people helped me out in times of need in my past and want to give some of that help back. I also like the fact that it is a loan and not just a hand out.
lenders.occupational_info: I answer the telephone and answer questions or solve problems for the customers of the company I work for.

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference and help people who are less blessed than I. It is important to me to help someone who in turn will help another. I want to be the catlyst of a cacade of good will..
lenders.occupational_info: I retired from regular employment and now only work part time and inspect homes and businesses for insurance companies. I identify risks and issues that allow people to improve their homes and businesses and get lower insurance rates.

lenders.name: MARYSAM
lenders.loan_because: it feels great making a difference to someone's LIFE....

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: To give a helping hand to those who wish to work for a better life for themselves or others.

lenders.name: Ed
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: nono
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people in the third world a chance to improve their current live-situation
lenders.occupational_info: I'm responsible for logistic projects and special tasks

lenders.name: Kath
lenders.whereabouts: Belmont very rural New York State

lenders.name: amie
lenders.occupational_info: am working in a micro finance company. as a loan officer my main job is to give out loans

lenders.name: Ronald Yuan
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: Everyone has dreams and goals in there life.  But sometimes those goals are put on hold because the money runs thin.  We all would love some help to meet those goals.  There have been people that helped me move forward.  I would like to return the favor and give to those who need that same help.
lenders.occupational_info: Military

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I just read a newspaper article stating that Australia is the 8th richest nation on earth today. It's time to share some of that around.

lenders.name: Elmerna
lenders.loan_because: I believe God wants me to share with the poor of this world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a voluntary teacher of English as a Second Language

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I can - and for that I am both fortunate and grateful.

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.occupational_info: I work with actors, writers, and directors in film, television, and theater

lenders.name: Roger Fraley
lenders.loan_because: I feel that I  have a responsibility to help and microcredit is an important tool of development and empowerment.
lenders.occupational_info: I build high quality Marinas and Waterfront Residential developments.  I also build floating houses.

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: sally
lenders.loan_because: Kiva gives me hope. It answers YES!!! to all the important questions i.e. Do dreams come true? Are humans inherently good? do we add to the blessings of life on our planet by sharing iin its joy and love and miracles? Is there a way that humans can use the good in us to sustain our species on the planet? In otherwards, can we truly help ourselves and each other without greed or envy? Are we basicly loving, joyful beings? ye yes yes I am so grateful for this organization. thank you for offering so much hope.
lenders.occupational_info: I wrie book about the magic and mysteries of life for small children. i am also writing a book for all ages about the relationship that each one of us has experienced with individual trees in our life called Treestories. As a realtor, I help people find a home that is right for them in price, personality, family need, location and energy.

lenders.name: Jeremey
lenders.loan_because: I saw a PBS program about Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: Lived in England for two years and returned to Toronto, but Embro is my home.

lenders.name: Rebekka
lenders.loan_because: The money I got for my Baptism can be used by others until I am 16
lenders.occupational_info: Easy Peasy:  sleep, eat, play

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy it.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I would like to leave a better world for my children and grandchildren.
lenders.occupational_info: I archive oceanographic data.

lenders.name: Ilene
lenders.loan_because: I want to do something to help people who want to help themselves but can not do it on their own.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist new businesses in creating a business image (logos, websites, business cards, etc.), and in getting their businesses and procedures organized and streamlined.

lenders.name: Jeanne
lenders.loan_because: I believe in micro-lending to help people get a leg up in supporting themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been an educator for 28 years.  I am now retiring and hope to do more in the world to make a difference.

lenders.name: Glenn & Debbie
lenders.loan_because: The Lord has been very good to us with bountiful blessings and we want to share with our brothers and sisters around the world.
lenders.occupational_info:
Debbie is a nurse caring for the elderly through Hospice
Glenn is an engineer for companies providing oil and gas to the nation

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: if everyone helps a little, we have the power to make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because: It's the least I can do.
